title: BRIEF-Co2 Solutions Inc To Continue With Efforts To Pursue Strategic Alternatives
text:
BRIEF-Co2 Solutions Inc To Continue With Efforts To Pursue Strategic Alternatives

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 16, 2019 18:11)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Co2 Solutions Inc To Continue With Efforts To Pursue Strategic Alternatives Sept 16 (Reuters) - CO2 Solutions Inc : * CO2 SOLUTIONS ANNOUNCES THE FILING OF A NOTICE OF INTENTION TO MAKE A PROPOSAL TO ITS CREDITORS UNDER THE BANKRUPTCY AND INSOLVENCY ACT (CANADA) * CO2 SOLUTIONS INC - ROBERT MANHERZ RESIGNED FROM BOARD * CO2 SOLUTIONS INC - WILL CONTINUE WITH ITS EFFORTS TO PURSUE STRATEGIC ALTERNATIVES * CO2 SOLUTIONS INC - ROBERT MANHERZ RESIGNED BECAUSE HE IS A SIGNIFICANT SECURED CREDITOR

BRIEF-Co2 Solutions Inc To Continue With Efforts To Pursue Strategic Alternatives
